name: club-social-media-manager
description: クラブ活動のSNS広報を効率化するツール - 広報補佐うさこ

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test:run --workspace=frontend && npm run test:run --workspace=backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=frontend && npm run test:coverage --workspace=backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=frontend && npm run typecheck --workspace=backend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup --workspace=frontend && npm run setup --workspace=backend
